name: Observe OS
description:
Stop the virus. This is my submission under Finite Skies for the 65'th #1Gam 1 Game a month. 

We are proud to publish our first submission for #1GAM - 1 Game a month.

We began working on this short project midway through May, as it is nowhere near as far as we would want it to be in development. However, we are happy with the theme we had going on.

We now set sail on a more ambitious project we have in the works, expect more updates from us soon! <3
